actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit

official_title: To amend the Truth in Lending Act to require 90 days notice before changing the annual percentage rate of interest applicable on any credit card account or before changing the index used to determine such rate, and for other purposes.
short_title: Credit Card Interest Rate Change Disclosure Act

summary.text: Credit Card Interest Rate Change Disclosure Act - Amends the Truth in Lending Act to set forth a 90-day advance notice period as a prerequisite to any increase in an annual percentage rate of interest (APR), or in the index used to determine APR, applicable to an open-end consumer credit plan.

titles.title: Credit Card Interest Rate Change Disclosure Act

To amend the Truth in Lending Act to require 90 days notice before changing the annual percentage rate of interest applicable on any credit card account or before changing the index used to determine such rate, and for other purposes.
